Journey

I am a Web Designer & Developer located in Uganda, Kampala specifically.
This Journey started since 2017 when i decided to dedacate all my time into the front-end development.
I'm a freelance for two years now, done remote work fot agencies, collaborated with talented people in the industry to make the Web more friendly.

I have a strong desire for UI effects and web technologies.
Well-organized person,problem solver and indepent employee. Interested in the entire technology industry and working on ambious projects with positive people.
